content:
Hello. is there a way to configure a dependency ? My problem:
I add the dependency in Cargo.toml
I can: cargo run my project
BUT I need to configure the dependency ... 2 options: 1) with a parameter during the build phase 2) by editing a config.h inside the dependency.
I am lost because everything is done "automatically".
Any way to do that ?

or another way to ask is. I created a build.rs to "link" the library.
println!("cargo:rustc-link-search=native={}", out_dir);
println!("cargo:rustc-link-lib=static=raylib");
so that I can compile it by myself on the side. The problem is that when I compile rust my main.rs has errors:
error[E0433]: failed to resolve: use of undeclared type or module raylib (and everywhere else). any idea ?
